gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: United States Department of Agriculture Agricultural Research Service
NASA GSFC Hydrological Sciences Branch, Laboratory for Hydrospheric Processes
NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: This Level-2 (L2) soil moisture product provides estimates of global land surface conditions retrieved by the Soil Moisture Active Passive (SMAP) passive microwave radiometer during 6:00 a.m. descending and 6:00 p.m. ascending half-orbit passes. SMAP L-band brightness temperatures are used to derive soil moisture data, which are then resampled to an Earth-fixed, global, cylindrical 36 km Equal-Area Scalable Earth Grid, Version 2.0 (EASE-Grid 2.0).

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: As a condition of using these data, you must cite the use of this data set using the recommended citation. For more information, see our Use and Copyright web page at https://nsidc.org/about/use_copyright.html.
These data are offered free of charge. You may use these data freely, provided that you cite NSIDC DAAC as the source, and provide an acknowledgment in any published papers.
